sen.j: 菊王丸（きくおうまる）とは、平家物語に登場する平教経の小姓（）である。
sen.e: Kikuo-maru is a pageboy of TAIRA no Noritsune who appears on Heike Monogatari (The Tale of the Heike).
Kikuo-maru was a pageboy of TAIRA no Noritsune who appears on Heike Monogatari (The Tale of the Heike).

sen.j: 始め平通盛に仕えていたが通盛の死後、弟である平教経に仕えた。
sen.e: At first he served TAIRA no Michimori, but after Michimori died, he served TAIRA no Noritsune, Michimori's younger brother.

sen.e: Legend has it that he died being shot his belllyband by Tadanobu SATO at the Battle of Yashima in 1185.

sen.j: 死亡時には萌黄縅の腹巻、三枚甲、白柄の長刀を身に着けていたとされる。
sen.e: It is said that Kikuo-maru put on a bellyband of light green, the three-ply armor, and the long sword with the hilt covered by white thread at the time of his death.

sen.e: The grave handed down as Kikuo-maru's is left at the next door in the north side of the municipal Yashimahigashi elementary school in Yahimahigashimachi, Takammatsu City.
